article_text:
Well, I can finally make my big announcement. It’s been over a year since I’ve been on the radio. And I have been put down, I’ve been ripped off, I have been cut open, and now I am unleashed!

And nobody’s going to stop me, because I’m taking my show off of terrestrial radio and onto the digital domain.

Introducing … Rusty Humphries’ Rebellion Radio, brought to you by The Washington Times. New episodes each Thursday!

article_metadata.Author: Rusty Humphries

article_summary:
Introducing … Rusty Humphries’ Rebellion Radio, brought to you by The Washington Times.
And nobody’s going to stop me, because I’m taking my show off of terrestrial radio and onto the digital domain.
And I have been put down, I’ve been ripped off, I have been cut open, and now I am unleashed!
It’s been over a year since I’ve been on the radio.
Well, I can finally make my big announcement.
